info.author: vincent_delft
info.description:
DirsSync is a wxPython tool to synchronise 2 directories. This application 
will synchronise all the files and all the sub-directories, and prompt the 
user to confirm all the moves. Functionalities : two-way synchronization 
, one-way synchronization ("local" to "remote", or vice versa), with 
  optional deletion on target directory, synchronizes according to time or file 
size, internationalised in English, French and Italian.
info.name: DirsSync
info.html_description:
DirsSync is a wxPython tool to synchronise 2 directories. This application
will synchronise all the files and all the sub-directories, and prompt the
user to confirm all the moves. Functionalities : two-way synchronization
, one-way synchronization ("local" to "remote", or vice versa), with
optional deletion on target directory, synchronizes according to time or file
size, internationalised in English, French and Italian.
